tweet: My final stop on this year’s #SC02BusTour was Shealy’s BBQ where I was able to enjoy a serving of South Carolina BBQ with a warm side of great company and hospitality. pic.twitter.com/B5FJNMg9Uh

My next stop on the #SC02BusTour today was at @Sorinex in Lexington, a family owned business that makes highly sought-after exercise equipment for professional teams, colleges, high schools, and military. It was great seeing their hard work first-hand. pic.twitter.com/Ov5PwJsl7R

I enjoyed openly discussing the issues with my community at the Irmo Chamber of Commerce this morning. It was great visiting with neighbors, friends, and community leaders as part of the #SC02BusTour. pic.twitter.com/yoUzrXYnhK
I had the opportunity to visit SRP Park today as part of the #SC02BusTour. It was great to tour the home of the North Augusta @GreenJackets! pic.twitter.com/4t4xG287nB

So far on day one of my annual #SC02BusTour, I’ve toured Batesville Tool & Die, visited Family Pharmacy, and talked to the Aiken Rotary Club. Looking forward to the rest of the day visiting with my community. pic.twitter.com/Bsr6uq5t6d

Follow along next week as I embark on my annual Bus Tour of the Second District of South Carolina. I'm looking forward to meeting with families, local business owners, and schools across the community. #SC02BusTour

This week is National Employer Support of the Guard and Reserve Week. I am grateful for the men and women who honorably combine military and civilian careers to protect our freedom and for the employers who support them.
We honor and remember Purple Heart recipients for the sacrifices they made for their country. #PurpleHeartDay pic.twitter.com/QFWcrFxLsZ
